item.description:
PLEASE NOTE!!!! LOCATION TO BE CHANGED FOR TONIGHT-
BCNC CLOSED FOR HOLIDAY.
Taiwan Cafe is located at 34 Oxford St, by the corner of Beach St. in Chinatown. 617-426-8181

This month, supper at Taiwan Cafe because BCNC is closed.

Mandarin Conversation group Meetup.
Monthly meeting to practice Mandarin conversation. Learners of all levels, and native speakers welcome!
This is an opportunity to meet with other learners and practice whatever you'd like to work on. Bring any books or homework you would like to review, and ask a native speaker to help you with pronounciation.

Detailed directions:
NOT MEETING AT BCNC TONIGHT! Taiwan Cafe is near the corner of Oxford and Beach St in Chinatown. 426-8181
------------
BCNC is at 38 Ash St. is off Oak St, at the interesection of Washington St., between Kneeland and Marginal Way.
The closest T stop is New England Medical Center.
Walk toward the South End (away from Chinatown) on Washington St and take the first left onto Oak St. The entrance to the building is in Ash St., the first small street on the left. There's a sign for BCNC- Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center. Sign in at the front desk and ask for the Meetup conversation group.
Parking is limited in the area, due to the theater district, but sometimes you can find spaces on the surrounding blocks. There are pay lots on Kneeland and Tremont Streets.
The phone number in case you get lost is 617-635-5129.

For more information, see http://www.bcnc.net...

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Chinese Language October Meetup
